website_summaries.verdict: The Fuhu Nabi Elev-8 is a very good gaming tablet for kids, although its hardware doesn't quite measure up with slates geared toward grownups.
pros: Lots of preloaded content for kids

customer_reviews.title: This nabi lags so bad. I wish I would have just gotten her ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this nabi for my 4 year old daughter for Christmas after her nabi jr stopped working (after having it for 2 years). This nabi lags so bad. I wish I would have just gotten her another nabi jr instead. It takes a min for apps to open and another min for it to load each time its going to the next page. I find it works better in mommy mode, But still the lag is just as annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Its garbage
customer_reviews.text: Extremely slow to load when turned on. Gets sluggish if too many apps are open and will frequently say NABI mode stopped working and won't let you do anything. I purchased this for my daughter to get her off my Galaxy tablet but after two months of having to constantly deal with this I just gave her my tablet back to play games on.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Nabi Elev-8 tablet
customer_reviews.text: Absolute worst tablet I’ve ever used. It didn’t work right from the moment I opened the box. It was slow (when it actually did respond at all) it crashed several times and when I downloaded an app, the app wouldn’t work. #neveragain
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Mattel should stick to making die cast cars and trucks and not electronics!
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's great for the kids. It has been returned multiple times as they are not able to correct the problem over the phone. It is currently frozen on start up. It has been a dead unit and failed to turn on at least 2 times. Have purchased 3 Nabis and will not purchase another!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: FLOP!!. Worked for a month and stopped. Turns out all Nabi tablets were defective and there was supposed to be a settlement issued to customers who purchased the tablets, however I never saw a settlement and I bought three, the De Nabi Jr. and the Nabi Elev
customer_reviews.author: Just A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better parental features than any other tablets on the market
customer_reviews.text: Way better parental features than any other tablets on the market. The bumper works great to protect it when it gets dropped
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is almost 2. Be sure to get ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 2. Be sure to get a feel for the parent mode and child mode prior to giving it to you little one, they will NOT want to give it back once they get it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi J

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Junk since the first day, which is sad since I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. Constant error messages, applications failing to operate, SLOW, not to mention half the preloaded apps and games disappeared without warning. Returning and purchasing a Kindle Fire for kids.
customer_reviews.author: alyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son as an upgrade to his last Nabi! He absolutely loves it! And it goes well with the other 3 Nabi tablets we have for him.
customer_reviews.author: TazW

customer_reviews.title: Broke, won't power on
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this died 10 months after we bought it. We really didn't use it much anyway. So won't power on after about 20 uses... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Maria Sandvoll

customer_reviews.title: Fast wifi connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this tablet for my 4 years old Granddaugther, she love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: actually getting to use it was nice. Its quick
customer_reviews.text: Came in a food saver box that was beat up. The Nabi was already powered on and loaded with someone else' data, and after a couple weeks of actually having it, and a few days of actually USING it, it no longer holds a charge.. On the other hand, actually getting to use it was nice. Its quick, responsive, and handles well. Nice thin and light design.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Really good tab for kids
customer_reviews.text: It's really a good tab just don't let any liquid touch it or its done
customer_reviews.author: K.jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous models.
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for x-mas presents for my children. One arrived not working. Returned it through amazon, with no problems. Now another one has gone bad and I have contacted Nabi directly, and they were very helpful, and will hopefully receive our replacement soon. I have only rated 3 stars because I feel this version of Nabi tablet is not up to the standards as their previous model. We have a Nabi 2 and a Nabi dream tab, both are still working and we only upgraded due to outdated OS and software. The battery life is much better though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Kids have easy navigation. Nani pass has excellent learning apps and games.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy an adult tablet and install child lock features! ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy an adult tablet and install child lock features! This is difficult to set up, and hard to download to.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The educational software is well developed and the possibility to switch between Parent/Child account is great. Highly recommended. The hardware looks durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josué D.

customer_reviews.title: Really sad they are not making this tablet
customer_reviews.text: as expected. Really sad they are not making this tablet anymore
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Lynn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as a Christmas gift for my 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Christmas gift for my 6 year old. It was glitchy and slow from the start and stopped working completely after 6 months. Mattel decided that they can not fix it and is sending me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: POS DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's Xmas gift last year and it's basically unusable. The processor is a potato. Don't waste your money. Just get a Samsung tablet and put a kids case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: The is the biggest price of cr&p someone could buy. The fact that this made it into production amazes me! The power button works half the time. Takes forever to power up.
customer_reviews.author: Sogol A.

product_meta.title: nabi Elev-8 Tablet
product_meta.description: From elevating screen time to enriching playtime, the innovative Nabi elev-8 delivers the most educational value and good-for-the-brain content in a kids tablet experience. This impressive tablet also provides more involvement for parents, offering the most robust time control system for monitoring tablet playtime. Nabi elev-8 comes with 6 free months of unlimited kid-friendly content from Nabi pass, and features the award-winning wings learning system for skill set mastery. It also includes blue Morph OS, which offers the most comprehensive parental controls and over 400 kid-focused features. With a Snapdragon 64-bit octal-core processor, 32GB of memory and an 8" IPS screen, Nabi elev-8 is one of the most enhanced, high-tech educational tablets available. Nabi elev-8 comes with 6 free months of Nabi pass. It's a single subscription to unlimited kid-friendly books, videos, apps, games and learning. Nabi pass is curated and refreshed each month with a mix of good-for-the-brain content and best in class kid-safe entertainment. Included in Nabi pass is the award-winning wings learning system, which offers 300,000 questions in math, reading and writing for pre-K through 6th grade, all aligned to common core state standards. Parents can access real-time reports on child proficiency levels with n-site reports. Nabi's blue Morph OS delivers the most comprehensive parental controls including unparalleled time controls for managing screen time. It also includes over 400 kid-focused features including, exclusive creativity apps, utilities for time and calendar, kid-safe social networking, and award-winning wings learning system. With a Snapdragon 64-bit octal-core processor, 32GB of memory, 8" IPS screen and Android 5.1 lollipop, the Nabi elev-8 gives you one of the most enhanced and impressive high-tech tablet experiences for kids.
feature_bullets: 6 months free all-you-can-eat apps, games, books, learning and more
Skill set mastery with wings learning system
The most comprehensive full featured tablet made just for kids
Includes over 400 kid-focused features including exclusive creativity apps, utilities for time and calendar, kid-safe social networking, and award-winning wings learning system
